data.name: Sample - GitHub - 1.0.0
data.description: GitHub is a code hosting platform for collaboration and version control. This connector facilitates automated interactions with Github, such as to create and manage repositories, branches, issues, pull requests, and many more.

workflows.description: Creates a new organization or authenticated user repository based on the repository name, organization name, base branch name, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Create Repository

workflows.description: Creates a new repository using a repository template based on the template repository, repository name, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Create Repository Using Template

workflows.description: Lists repositories for the specified organization based on the organization name, repository type, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: List Organization Repositories

workflows.description: Lists public repositories for the specified user based on the username, repository type, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: List User Repositories

workflows.description: Lists repositories that the authenticated user has explicit permission (:read, :write, or :admin) to access.
workflows.name: List Authenticated User Repositories

workflows.description: Updates a personal repository of a specified user based on the repository name, repository owner, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Update Repository

workflows.description: Delete the specified organization or user repository from GitHub
workflows.name: Delete Repository

workflows.description: Forks an organization repository for the specified repository owner based on the repository owner, repository name, and organization name you have specified
workflows.name: Fork Organization Repository

workflows.description: Lists the repositories that have been forked for the specified organization based on the repository owner, repository name, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: List Fork Repositories

workflows.description: Creates a new repository using a repository template based on the template repository, repository name, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Create or Update File Contents

arguments.title: GitHub: Create or Update File Contents

routes.name: Start-> Create or Update File Contents

workflows.description: Updates a personal repository of a specified user to add a collaborator for the repository based on the repository name, collaborator username, repository owner, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Add Repository Collaborator

workflows.description: Retrieves branch revision details of the specified branch in GitHub based on the base branch, repository name, and repository owner you have specified
workflows.name: Get Branch Revision

workflows.description: Creates a new branch in GitHub based on the repository name, base branch type, repository owner, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Create Branch

workflows.description: Merges a specified branch to the base branch in GitHub based on the repository name, base branch name, repository owner, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Merge Branch

workflows.description: Lists branches of the specified repository based on the repository name, repository owner, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: List Branches

workflows.description: Synchronizes a branch of a forked repository to keep it up-to-date with the upstream repository based on the repository name, repository owner, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Fetch Upstream

workflows.description: Clones the specified repository in GitHub based on the repository name you have specified. You can choose to clone the repository in the 'zip' format
workflows.name: Clone Repository

workflows.description: Applies changes made in a FortiSOAR file to the specified remote repository that is cloned from GitHub based on the file IRI and cloned repository path you have specified
workflows.name: Update Remote Repository

workflows.description: Commits the local repository changes to the specified repository in GitHub based on the repository name, cloned repository path, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Push Changes

workflows.description: Creates a pull request for the specified repository on GitHub based on the repository name, repository owner, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Create Pull Request

workflows.description: Lists pull requests for the specified repository on GitHub based on the repository name, repository owner, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: List Pull Request

workflows.description:
Adds reviews for the specified pull request on GitHub based on the repository name, repository owner, pull request number, and other input parameters you have specified. 
Pull request authors, repository owners, and collaborators can request a pull request review from anyone with write access to the repository. Each requested reviewer will receive a notification asking them to review the pull request
workflows.name: Add Reviewers for a Pull Request

arguments.title: GitHub: Add Reviewers for a Pull Request

steps.name: Add Reviewers for a Pull Request

arguments.name: GitHub
arguments.operationTitle: Add Reviewers for a Pull Request

routes.name: Start-> Add Reviewers for a Pull Request

workflows.description: Lists the review comments associated with the specified pull request on GitHub based on the repository name, repository owner, pull request number, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: List Review Comments on a Pull Request

arguments.title: GitHub: List Review Comments on a Pull Request

steps.name: List Review Comments on a Pull Request

arguments.name: GitHub
arguments.operationTitle: List Review Comments on a Pull Request

routes.name: Start-> List Review Comments on a Pull Request

workflows.description: Merges the specified pull request on GitHub based on the repository name, repository owner, pull request number, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Merge Pull Request

workflows.description: Creates a release for the specified repository on GitHub based on the repository name, repository owner, target branch, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Create Release

workflows.description: Returns a list of releases, which does not include regular Git tags that have not been associated with a release. Information about published releases is available to everyone. Only users with push access will receive listings for draft releases. The list of releases is retrieved from GitHub based on the repository name, repository owner, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: List Releases

workflows.description: Lists the people that have marked the specified repository in GitHub with a star based on the repository name, repository owner, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: List Stargazers

workflows.description: Stars the specified repository for the authenticated user in GitHub based on the repository name and repository owner you have specified
workflows.name: Star Repository

workflows.description: Lists the people that are watching the specified repository in GitHub based on the repository name, repository owner, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: List Watchers

workflows.description: Sets the subscription to the specified repository in GitHub based on the repository name, repository owner, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Set Repository Subscription
